title: Close to The Strip, Siegel Rewards Program, Fully Furnished
posting_body: ['Looking for a great Las Vegas extended stay apartment?', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Elevator Access', '-Free High Speed Wi-Fi', '-Special Corporate and Group Rates', '-Free Utilities', '-Fully Equipped Kitchenette', '-Free Parking', '-Flat Screen TVs', '-Housekeeping & Linen Services Available', '-Fully Furnished', '-Guest Laundromat On Site', '-Close to The Strip', '-Siegel Rewards Program', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
